pages.text: Ever wanted to hit something with a $(l:aoa3:swords#swords)sword$(/l), but also want the enemy to fly away into the sunset?$(br)Well now you can! $(thing)Mauls$() offer the extended reach of $(l:aoa3:greatblades#greatblades)greatblades$(/l) while offering a heavy-duty knockback on hit, in exchange for lower damage output.
pages.title: Mauls

pages.text: In general, $(thing)mauls$() are intended to be used a way to keep dangerous enemies at a distance, or quickly clearing away an enemy that has come too close.$(br2)While not offering the higher $(t:Damage Per Second)DPS$(/t) of swords, Mauls do offer a significant knockback factor, which is best used for larger individual mobs with strong attacks.
$(thing)Mauls$() offer the reach distance of $(l:aoa3:greatblades#greatblades)greatblades$(/l) with some added power for great golf games.
pages.title: A Maul

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)mauls$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
